ClassDef.Name: BodyPosition

Properties.Name: TargetPosition
Properties.Description: Determines the target position that the body applies forces to get to.

Properties.Name: Force
Properties.Description: Determines how much force the body applies.

Properties.Name: AcceptanceDistance
Properties.Description: Determines how close the body has to be to the target position to stop applying forces to it.

ClassDef.Description: BodyPosition are objects that apply a force to their parent until it moves toward the target position.
